module.name: Custom Applications
module.description: Registry to add custom extensions and destinations that may be created and used so that the Extensions and Destinations Registry can include these.
module.changelog: *2.4.0.4* #2700 block editing of destination field when once other modules are using it *2.4.0.3* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0.2* #2558 can't edit/del custom extension *2.4.0.1* Fix typo in install script, non-existent primary key *2.4.0* First release of module
